quest.name: Agostine The Tailor
Fur Quest
quest.text: Bring some different beverages for Agostine.

quest.name: Agostine The Tailor
Fur Quest
quest.text: Agostine looks pleased as he drinks the potion.

quest.name: Agostine The Tailor
Fur Quest
quest.text: Agostine is a tailor, they can't hunt animals for fluffy fur. Maybe you can help ?

quest.name: Agostine The Tailor
Fur Quest
quest.text: Bring your fur to Agostine! They want the best of fur.

quest.name: Agostine The Tailor
Fur Quest
quest.text: You finally found the good furs. But now Agostine want 15,000 GP for the work.

quest.name: Agostine The Tailor
Fur Quest
quest.text: Agostine made you a pair of warm winter gloves, congratz!

quest.name: Agostine The Tailor
Fur Quest
quest.text: How you know, Agostine is a tailor, they can't hunt animals for fluffy fur. Maybe you can help ?
They need some [@@611|@@] and one pair of [@@528|@@]

quest.name: Agostine The Tailor
Fur Quest
quest.text: You finally found the good furs. But now Agostine want again 15,000 GP for the work.

quest.name: Agostine The Tailor
Fur Quest
quest.text: You have your own pair of warm fur boots, congratz.
